name: Avoid unlimited occurs on grids (PeopleSoft)
description: This quality rules detects Grid having the option "Unlimited Occurs Count (rows)" checked in.
output:
This report lists all the PeopleSoft Grids having the option "Unlimited Occurs Count"checked.
It provides the following information:
- PeopleSoft Grid full name
rationale: Grid : Don't use unlimited occurs : there could be hundreds of rows coming back at a time, causing performance issues.
remediation: In Application Designer, open the page who contains the grid, and in the grid options in "General Tab", uncheck the option "Unlimited Occurs Count"

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - Memory, Network and Disk Space Management
